scripts.start-dev: node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --watch --outDir ./dist & node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc index.ts --outDir ./dist & sleep 10 && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp demo.env dist/demo.env; cd dist; eval $(cat demo.env) ../node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js dist/index.js
scripts.start-demo: node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc index.ts --outDir ./dist && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp demo.env dist/demo.env && eval $(cat demo.env) node dist/index.js
